div.p: Indicates whether this alert is active and needs to be displayed to a user, or whether it is no longer needed or entered in error
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/alert-status

tr.td: A current alert that should be displayed to a user. A system may use the category to determine which roles should view the alert.
The alert does not need to be displayed any more.
The alert was added in error, and should no longer be displayed.

description.value: Indicates whether this alert is active and needs to be displayed to a user, or whether it is no longer needed or entered in error

definition.value: A current alert that should be displayed to a user. A system may use the category to determine which roles should view the alert.
The alert does not need to be displayed any more.
The alert was added in error, and should no longer be displayed.
